param.name: docker_gradle_version
param.spec: text label='Gradle version' description='The version of Gradle to use during execution of Gradle tasks.' display='hidden' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: docker_jdk_version
param.spec: text label='JDK version' description='The version of the JDK to use during execution of tasks in a JDK.' display='hidden' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: env.PUBLISHED_JAVA_ARTIFACT_ID
param.spec: text label='Published artifact id' description='The maven coordinate artifact id that has been published by this build. Can not be empty.' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: env.PUBLISHED_JAVA_GROUP
param.spec: text label='Published group' description='The maven coordinate group that has been published by this build. Can not be empty.' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: git_branch_spec
param.spec: text label='The branch specification of the repository' description='By default all main branches are build by the configuration. Modify this value to adapt the branches build.' display='hidden' validationMode='any'

param.name: git_main_branch
param.spec: text label='Git Main Branch' description='The git main or default branch to use in VCS operations.' display='hidden' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: github_repository_name
param.spec: text label='The github repository name. Used to connect to it in VCS Roots.' description='This is the repository slug on github. So for example `ForgeGradle` or `MinecraftForge`. It is interpolated into the global VCS Roots.' display='hidden' validationMode='not_empty'
